name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: Results-oriented Senior Fleet Engineer with 8+ years of expertise in **Linux**, **Networking**, and **System Maintenance**. Proficient in **Bash** and **Python**, with hands-on experience in **Software Troubleshooting** and **Hardware Troubleshooting**. Skilled in monitoring and performance optimization using tools like **Grafana** and **Prometheus**. Strong background in maintaining high-performance systems and implementing effective solutions in dynamic environments. With a solid foundation in **Kubernetes** for container orchestration and experience in **HPC**, I excel in enhancing system reliability and efficiency, while leveraging my technical acumen to support complex operational needs.

experience.responsibilities:

• Monitored application health and performance metrics using **Grafana** and **Prometheus**, achieving a **25%** reduction in downtime incidents through proactive troubleshooting.
• Developed automated **Bash** and **PowerShell** scripts for system diagnostics, enhancing troubleshooting efficiency by **40%** and reducing time-to-resolution for issues.
• Implemented and maintained container orchestration using **Kubernetes**, achieving a **99.9%** uptime by managing deployments and scaling operations across multiple environments.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to resolve hardware and software troubleshooting issues, ensuring seamless functionality across all systems and reducing incident resolution time by **30%**.
• Spearheaded the integration of monitoring solutions like **Grafana** with Kubernetes clusters, providing insights into system performance and resource utilization metrics.
• Conducted regular system maintenance, performance tuning, and updates on existing hardware/software components, resulting in improved operational efficiencies.
• Assisted in the development and deployment of High-Performance Computing (**HPC**) solutions, optimizing workloads and resource allocation to meet demanding processing requirements.
• Led training sessions for junior engineers, enhancing their skills in **Linux** systems, software and hardware troubleshooting, and environment management.

• Utilized **Linux** to manage and maintain the fleet management systems, ensuring optimal performance and uptime of **Python**-based applications.
• Implemented **Bash** scripting for automated routine checks and system maintenance tasks, resulting in a **20%** reduction in manual intervention.
• Diagnosed and resolved hardware and software troubleshooting issues, effectively contributing to a **95%** resolution rate within **24 hours**.
• Developed monitoring solutions using **Prometheus** and **Grafana**, which improved system observability and reduced incident response times by **30%**.
• Coordinated network configurations and optimizations to enhance connectivity for fleet management applications, ensuring robust performance across **multiple** sites.
• Led system maintenance initiatives to upgrade and patch existing fleet management software, employing **Kubernetes** for efficient deployment and scaling of containerized applications.
• Managed and deployed high-performance compute (HPC) resources for processing large volumes of data critical to fleet operations.
• Automated deployment processes using CI/CD pipelines in **Azure DevOps** and **GitHub Actions**, improving deployment intervals by **40%**.
• Conducted comprehensive fleet system health checks, utilizing monitoring tools to identify potential risks and proactively address system vulnerabilities.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure compliance with networking standards and implemented best practices in networking for fleet operations.

Executed system maintenance and performance monitoring using **Grafana** and **Prometheus** to ensure the health and efficiency of fleet systems.

Leveraged data analytics and monitoring tools to proactively identify and address potential system bottlenecks, optimizing the fleet management process and increasing reliability.
